name: Lovely Knightsbridge Flat - central, quiet, garden
description:
LONG TERM LET ONLY.
A light and quiet two bedroom flat forms part of a period building in one of London's most exclusive tree-lined garden squares. 4 minute walk from Harrods.

The flat has a private garden with bbq and deck, and private residents central garden.

Please get in touch before you book and let me know your plans. :-)

The space
The flat is quiet yet central. A real delight at a very reasonable price. Just check our reviews. Perfectly formed with all you could want. Close to everywhere you want to go.
With Wi-FI, desk and printer in one bedroom you can use it as your live work office.
And just as easily as you can use it as a romantic getaway, with uplit garden and bespoke bathroom.
Family's are also welcome as the easy transport links will make exploring a doddle and much of the time you can just walk to kid friendly museums and parks on un-crowded back streets.

The main bed is a US Queen sized
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is South of Beauchamp Place within walking distance of Knightsbridge Tube, Kings Road and premier shopping facilities like Harrods.
Very close to world class Museums - the Natural History, Victoria and Albert, and Science Museums, parks, river Thames, bars and pubs all within easy walking distance.
host_about: I am from Somerset in the South West of England. I like making short films and documentaries. And extreme exuberance and then going to bed for a week.

name: ❤ Charming 2 Bedroom Luxury Flat, South Kensington
description:
Elegantly furnished Grade II listed 2 bedroom lower-ground floor period flat in a beautiful and exclusive South Kensington neighbourhood of Queen's Gate. Close to bars, café, supermarkets & many restaurants. Nearby attractions include; Natural History, V&A, Science Musuems - Royal Albert Hall, Hyde Park / Kensington Palace and Harrods. Other famous London landmarks are just a short train ride away; both Gloucester Road & South Kensington train stations are within a few minutes walking distance

The space
Living Room:
High ceiling, spacious and bright. Comfortable sofa, marble coffee, LED TV with a wide choice of satellite channels, armchair and selection of books. Dining table with 4 chairs.

Kitchen:
The kitchen comes equipped with quality integrated appliances; oven, hob, dishwasher, built in microwave and fridge-freezer. Crockery and cutlery are supplied with a selection of cooking utensils and cookware, Nespresso coffee maker, kettle and
neighborhood_overview: This flat is in an exclusive area of South Kensington with the National History Museum, V&A Museum, and Science Museum as neighbours. It’s a short stroll to Kensington Palace, Harrods, Hyde Park, and the Royal Albert Hall. Tube stations are close by.
host_about: I'm a management consultant, a keen swimmer as well as a foodie. I love flying and spend time travelling, experiencing new culture. I have visited and lived in various parts of the world including Asia, Europe, Australasia, and America.  I enjoy hosting and have hosted over a hundred guests; if you have any questions about your stay please feel free to get in touch as I would be happy to help

name: Charming Notting Hill 2BR w/ garden
description:
A lovely, light and airy apartment with two double bedrooms in the heart of beautiful Notting Hill. Recently decorated and with access to gorgeous private gardens. A quiet street but very near hustle and bustle of Portobello Road. Live the film!

The space
A beautiful Victorian terraced house on a classic Notting Hill street. A beautiful apartment that sleeps four comfortably in two equal sized double bedrooms with queen beds.

Access to magical private gardens so you can live your Hugh Grant and Julia Roberts fantasy without having to climb over the fence!

I live in a different house so apart from giving keys and answering any questions you will have the house to yourself.

For those who have seen the film Notting Hill, they won't need explaining what makes it a picture postcard perfect example of London at its best. Tree lined streets, old Victorian gaslamps, magical private gardens between each block, charming pubs, trendy restau
neighborhood_overview: For those who have seen the film Notting Hill, they won't need explaining what makes it a picture postcard perfect example of London at its best. Tree lines streets, old Victorian gas lamps, magical communal gardens between each block, charming pubs, trendy restaurants and bars, Portobello with its world famous antique shops plus Westbourne Grove with its designer boutiques. I could go on for ever...
host_about: I'm from London but am spending a lot of time in New York for work, hence why the apartment is available. Love the experience so far - met some lovely people who've treated the place like their own.

The space
The flat has a really wonderful atmosphere, it is extremely peaceful and light whilst being right in the heart of notting hill.

Guest access
You'll be able to access all of the space

A minute away from pubs and wonderful restaurants.

neighborhood_overview: Kensington is one of London's wealthiest and most elegant locations and, so naturally, contains many of London's finest restaurants, shops, and art galleries.

name: NOTTING HILL 2 bed balcony flat with shared garden
description:
Stylish 2-bed Notting Hill apartment.
First floor, cosy, warm and bright balcony flat in Victorian stucco building, overlooking beautiful private gardens in central London.
High ceilings and huge windows. Open plan kitchen, dining & living room opening onto south facing balcony on pretty, tree-lined street. Access to private communal gardens which run the length of the road. Portobello Market, shops, cafes, cinemas are a 2 minute walk. Close to Kensington Palace & Hyde Park

The space
Our apartment is not currently available, but we expect to be taking bookings at the end of 2021.

During this difficult time when travel has become almost impossible, we would like to send our best wishes to all our future and past guests - who have visited from Europe, the US, China, Malaysia and all over the world and stayed in our home. We hope you are well and that we might be able to welcome you back in the future

We will be committed to maki
neighborhood_overview:
We are right in the heart of Notting Hill. There is plenty to explore here - from Portobello Market; to cafes, coffee shops and restaurants; vintage clothes shops and up-market boutiques.
There is also plenty of green space with Holland Park, Kensington Gardens and Hyde Park a short walk or bus ride away. There is also a canal to the north which makes a nice walk along the tow path to Paddington ( watch out for cyclists!)
Kensington Palace is right on the doorstep and we are spoilt for museums with the Science Museum and Natural History Museum fantastic for children and the Victoria and Albert Museum for those interested in history, art and fashion. It also has a fabulous cafe inside and out.

name: Lovely 2Bed Chelsea bet famous Kings Road &Thames!
description:
Lovely two bedroom flat sandwiched between the famous Kings Road with its shops, cafés and restaurants, and the River Thames on Chelsea Embankment, In an area rich in history (conservation area)

The property is spacious and well-kept, and has a very warm feel to it. There are two bedrooms, that sleeps 4, a bright and airy living room and a spacious kitchen.

The Cadogan Pier is 300m walk to catch ferries to Tate, Canary Warf, Tower Bridge etc. Alternatively walk, taxi or bus to Sloan Sq

The space
Spacious two-bed flat on the ground floor in Kings Mansions. The property has a bright living room with loads of natural light. There is an open plan kitchen, equipped with modern appliances. The flat boasts of two bedrooms with extra comfy beds, ensuring a good night's sleep. Linen on notice can be supplied for a double sofa bed in the living room, subject to the flat sleeping max 4. My cleaners place fresh, hotel quality linen on your bed prior t
neighborhood_overview: Smirking along the banks of the Thames, pomp and circumstance precedes Chelsea’s bohemian-turned-businessman reputation. Influential bands like The Beatles and The Rolling Stones lent their stardom to Chelsea during the 60s. The neighborhood’s Swinging London era fame has abated, and its cadre of punks and hippies has grown into sleek-suited business people stepping out of chic townhomes. Chelsea isn’t always polite—its residents root ferociously for their home team, Chelsea FC.

name: Charming Chelsea Flat / Peaceful Terrace / London's West End
description: Located in the fashionable Chelsea area of London, within easy reach of all the attractions and walking distance of fine restaurants, pubs and the chic shopping on the famous Kings Road. Newly renovated, lovely high ceilings, hardwood floors throughout, and fully-equipped kitchen. Have a meal and relax in a bright bay window or outdoors at a bistro table on our private sheltered roof terrace. This is our second home - I'm sure you will also feel at home.
neighborhood_overview:
Located on a quiet street in the heart of the fashionable Chelsea/Earls Court/South Kensington districts but close to many fine restaurants, bistros, and cafes. A short walk to the Kings Road provides some of the best shopping in London. Easy to travel around by train and on foot. London is a 'walking city'. Closest Underground station is Earls Court which is only 8 minutes walk away from our apartment.
We love to unwind on our private roof Terrace with a glass of wine - hope you can too!
host_about:
We have lived in Blackheath for 20+ years raising our family and now enjoy travelling and welcoming people to our home. We also love walking, cycling, yoga and healthy living. 

Before Blackheath we lived abroad and visited the U.S. extensively.  Prior to this, we are both Londoners - Blackheath offers us beautiful country living but is just a short trip away from London - one of the greatest cities in the world! We are very lucky!

name: Elegant 2 bed flat in Notting Hill
description:
Welcome to my home! My beautiful 2 bedroom apartment, in the vibrant area of Notting Hill, is a stylish and comfortable place to stay and has terrific transport links. You’re just a 7 minute walk away from the Ladbroke Grove tube station and just around the corner from Portobello Market!
My property has is elegant and chic and has a private garden for those warmer days...
Explore the neighbourhood and enjoy this bustling part of London.
I hope you enjoy your stay!

The space
My stylish 2 bedroom apartment is the perfect base when visiting London. Conveniently located in the exciting area of Notting Hill, and with great transport links, you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle!
The living area is an elegant space with a beautiful, modern design and lovely finishing touches. Relax on the sofa, hang out, make yourself at home! It’s a welcoming and inviting space where you can kick back.
If cooking is y
neighborhood_overview:
Ladbroke Grove is neighbour to Notting Hill and is not short on character or things to do. Great restaurants are on every corner - try Lisa's Kitchen and Bar for authentic Scandinavian food. West Thirty Six is great fun and the Golborne Deli is very nearby and worth a visit.
For brilliant brunch, you can’t go wrong with Egg Break. They focus, unsurprisingly, on eggs! Great food with a fun atmosphere.
Expect to queue at Granger & Co - this place is very popular with locals. They do a fantastic brunch but don’t disappoint at lunch or dinner either.
The Ledbury is an unusual combination of being both a friendly neighbourhood restaurant and the proud holders of a Michelin star. The staff aren’t stuffy and the food isn’t pretentious, but you definitely will need to book well in advance.
Fans of Mexican food should head to Santo - they have every kind of tequila you could possibly want, authentic food, and a lively vibe as the night goes on!

name: La Vie En Rose
description:
Plum tones and plush comfort are the order of the day in this stylish two-bedroom garden apartment. Uniting the best of both worlds, you can relish the peace and quiet of leafy St Charles Square from the comfort of your own patio, whilst enjoying great transport links to all the city sights, and the buzz of trendy Notting Hill on your doorstep - boasting boutiques, restaurants, and the famous Portobello Road Market.

RAISED GROUND FLOOR

LIVING ROOM
Lively accents of crimson pink and deep purple create a warm, welcoming living space, featuring velvety textures and vivid modern artwork. Pale wood flooring and a large bay window flood the room with natural light, and a charming window seat - complete with on-theme fuchsia cushions, naturally - provides a scenic spot to read and relax.

DINING ROOM
Head down a couple of steps and you'll find yourself in a bright and airy dining area. A seamless blend of classic and chic, with its polished
host_about:
Greetings from the Veeve team!


Veeve manage the largest collection of homes to rent for short stays in London since 2011, launching in Paris in 2017. Our rental homes are predominantly privately-owned, lived-in homes in vibrant neighbourhoods. Thanks to our fully managed service, when you stay in a Veeve property you can benefit from the spaciousness, personal style and relaxed feel of a home – but with all the amenities of a hotel.


Once a booking is confirmed our Customer Service team will become your main point of contact and get in touch with you to organise your arrival at the property (including airport transfers, upon request); after which our on-the-ground management team will look after all aspects of your stay, with in-stay support available to help with any queries.


We have strict cleanliness guidelines for our cleaners and all staff who enter our properties and have reinforced existing cleaning procedures in line with official WHO, British and French government guidance.


As always, our team ensure that all properties are cleaned to a professional standard before and after each stay, with increased focus on touch-point cleaning (door handles, kitchen surfaces, kettles, taps etc.).

 All staff who enter properties will follow the below procedures:
 

- Carry and regularly use alcohol-based hand rub
- Sanitise their mobile phones 
- Focus extra attention when cleaning key touch-point areas (door handles, kitchen surfaces, kettles, taps etc.)
- Wear protective gear where appropriate
- Wash and disinfect work shoes


We might be able to arrange for property viewings, upon request, for stays of over 28 nights. 

Please be aware once a booking is confirmed you will be required to complete a Rental Agreement and also  ID verification via our partners Superhog. This is mandatory for all our stays and in accordance to short lets requirements with Veeve.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will be sure to answer you promptly.

name: Sophisticated 2Bed w/Conservatory nr Notting Hill
description:
Welcome to my home! I’m excited to open up my property to fellow Airbnb travellers. My beautiful 2-bedroom apartment, in the vibrant area of Ladbroke Grove, is a stylish and comfortable place to stay and has terrific transport links. You’re just a 3-minute walk away from the nearest tube. The flat is steps away from Portobello Market and the cute, colourful homes of Notting Hill.

Explore the neighbourhood and enjoy this bustling part of London. I hope you enjoy your stay!

The space
My stylish two-bedroom apartment is the perfect base when visiting London. Conveniently located in the exciting area of Ladbroke Grove and with great transport links, you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle!

The living area is light and airy with an elegant, sophisticated design and lovely finishing touches. The natural wooden flooring highlights the neutral colour scheme used for the interiors and the several design element
neighborhood_overview:
Notting Hill is one of London’s most exciting and vibrant areas. Packed full of restaurants and fashionable shops and home to the famous Portobello Market, you’re unlikely to get bored in this neighborhood. Quirky backstreets and pretty gardens attract many to wander the streets of this beautiful part of London. Feel like you’ve gone back in time by seeing a film at the iconic Electric Cinema, one of Britain’s oldest working movie theatres. Alternatively, have a look around the intriguing building of the famously open and welcoming Kensington Temple Church. If you visit towards the end of August, you cannot miss Notting Hill Carnival, a vibrant and colourful celebration of Caribbean culture dating back more than 50 years.

For brilliant brunch, you can’t go wrong with Egg Break who specialise, unsurprisingly, in eggs! The Shed is a modern British restaurant where the plates are small but delicious, all the food is seasonal and the dishes creative; it has become a local favori
host_about:
Hi, my fellow travellers! I am a Singapore expat, proprietor of an International Wealth Management firm, who has a passion for travelling and firmly believes in opening his doors to visitors from any part of the world. I hope you'll feel at home and have the best time!
We contracted a great property management team to look after you during your stay, enjoy!

description:
Newly renovated, luxury apartment on 5th floor of prestigious Chelsea apartment block, with porter, communal gardens and garden views of Pelham Crescent. New kitchen, good storage, separate dining area and second bedroom with double bed.
Very close to South Kensington and Sloane Square and short commute to City business area as well as high quality shopping in Knightsbridge and Kings Road and museums

The apartment is ideal for a single person, or couple requiring more space. Equally, the apartment can accommodate an additional couple given the second bedroom with double bed and comfortable reception areas

name: Walmer Yard - a unique architectural home
description:
Walmer Yard is more than a home: it allows you to experience the best of what architecture has to offer, a potent distillation of light, volume, raw materials and refined craftsmanship. It's a place of contrasts: the starkness of black folded-steel stairs against the sensuality of the handrails, rope wrapped in leather; the roughness of exposed concrete against the gloss of lacquered wardrobes. Both contemplative and sensual, this is the luxury not of trinkets but of intensely lived experiences.

The space
House One sits at the front of the site on the quiet residential street of Walmer Road. It has two double bedrooms which each have an ensuite. Alongside its large kitchen and dining space there are ample spaces to relax or to socialise. Venture to the top of the house and you will discover a large ‘yurt’ space with a balcony that overlooks the courtyard and down in the basement there is another large living space.

There is also a large south-facing co
neighborhood_overview: Sandwiched between bustling Kensington High Street, Notting Hill and Portobello Road, Holland Park is both laid back and buzzing. Residential blocks of mansions surround the communal gardens that inspired Richard Curtis’ film Notting Hill. This leafy neighbourhood has a historic green space at its heart - Holland Park - where you can walk among Japanese gardens and Dutch tulips. The park itself symbolises the epitome of West London living, where acres of lush green space meets the best of London’s cultural scene in the form of the open air opera house and theatre, and the Design Museum. In addition to the area’s scenic landscape, its hip boutiques and restaurants, international schools and high end property market have lured a global crowd.
host_about: I'm the Keeper of Walmer Yard, where I run the Baylight Foundation, a registered charity, with the aim of increasing the public understanding of what architecture can do, rooted in the experience of Walmer Yard.

name: #RoyalPadLondon - Earls Court Kensington&Chelsea
description:
Our playful and beautifully well appointed Earls Court Garden flat with the most wonderful "Royal" collection. A truly mesmerising array of wonders, a real must for tourists and history fans!

The space
This playful 2 bedroom flat combines the sophistication and class of a Georgian building with the ease of modern living. neighborhood_overview: Notting hill is a neighbourhood that is synonymous with London. A vibrant, trendy area with casual cafes that line bohemian Portobello Road, famed for its busy market selling antiques and vintage fashion, local vegetables from farms and fresh produce like fish, bread, cheese and meat. Included amenities: Wifi, Welcome Pack, Toiletries, Area Tips, Cleaning, Fridge Fill Service, Cafetiere, 24/7 Support.


Just a short walk from Westbourne Grove and Portobello Road, Pembridge Villas III is the perfect choice for fans of all things fashion. The sultry palette of this two-bedroom ground floor apartment is complemented by sparkling chandeliers and subtle gold accents, illuminated by the natural light pouring in through the windows. Step outside and you’ll find yourself among the bustling streets of Notting Hill - a vibrant district renowned for its upmarket boutiques, independent coffee shops, and its resident fashionistas.:

In the home’s living areas, dark wood flooring and furnishings contrast against bright white walls and soft textures, creating a chic yet cosy space. Whether you’re planning a special date night or an evening of entertaining, the glamorous bar and dining area provides an intimate space for wining and dining with your other
host_about:
At onefinestay, we open doors to the finest homes and villas in the most desirable destinations and deliver a one-of-a-kind service to guests, homeowners and travel partners around the world. With each memorable stay, we deliver a level of personal service and professional hospitality unmatched in the private rental industry. Established in London in 2010, we are now part of Accor, joining other luxury brands such as Fairmont and Raffles.

When you book with us, the entire experience is professionally managed to ensure the highest quality stay. Our advisors help find a beautiful home that’s right for you, we can also add tailored experiences when you book and we’re available 24/7 for support.

name: Rerfurbished Knightsbridge 2BR, nr Harrod's
description:
Show up and start living from day one in London with this sophisticated two-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Knightsbridge home with stunning views over the city. (#LON186)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your spacious living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Knightsbridge apartment has to offer.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

- Private Garden
- Garden


Please check the house rules as fees may apply for
neighborhood_overview: Step out of this lovely furnished apartment and into the charming surrounds of Knightsbridge. This slice of South Kensington-Chelsea has no shortage of hotspots like Harrods and the Victoria & Albert Museum. Hidden gems are yours for the uncovering like the numerous Blue Plaque historic buildings, Russian and Gulf eateries, striking embassy buildings and easy access to Hyde Park. Knightsbridge and South Kensington tube stops keep you connected to the rest of London thanks to service on the Circle, Piccadilly and District lines.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Delightful 2Bed Apt in Notting Hill
description:
This is a truly Idyllic apartment for your trip to London. Sophisticated and comfortable, with two cosy bedrooms and a spacious sitting room, you won't want to leave!

The real hidden gem of this apartment is the bright courtyard, a rare find in a London apartment, and the perfect spot for a morning coffee or an evening glass of wine.

You couldn't be better located - 5 minutes from Notting Hill Gate tube station, Hyde Park, and Holland Park, and a short walk from the iconic Portobello Market!

The space
This is a truly charming apartment. As with many London properties, it is not the most spacious, but this has been taken into account in every element of the design.
The sitting room has plenty of comfortable space to relax in after a day out exploring London. There is a TV in the sitting room - please note that it is quite small, but with lots to watch!
The kitchen is a cleverly designed galley kitchen, connecting the sitting room
neighborhood_overview: Notting Hill is one of London's most fashionable areas. You are just minutes from Portobello Market, which comes alive on Saturday mornings with a wealth of stalls, and minutes from Hyde Park (stroll across to reach Buckingham Palace!) .
host_about:
My name is Emily, and I am the founder of Air Peace of Mind, a high-end property management company based in London.  I started the company 4 years ago having managed my own home and hosted global guests for their short term stay in London and we have been growing purely through word of mouth and reputation ever since! My small team and I vet every single property that we bring on; each home has to be of a high standard and all are unique. We manage all types of properties from 5-bed family houses to 1-bed designer apartments, so there is a property to suit each guest's needs.
 
The homes are prepared to a high standard for all our guests with hotel quality linen.  We are available to help with any questions and recommendations throughout your stay.
 
Our team is dedicated to providing guests with the best experience possible, so please do not hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions or queries, we are happy to help and look forward to hosting you!

neighborhood_overview: Right in the heart of Shepherd's Bush, this home is the perfect location for friends or family. Both Holland Park and Notting Hill are a few minutes away, and you are surrounded by hundreds of great restaurants and bars. With so many tube stations a few steps away, you have easy access to anywhere in London and can walk to most areas of central London in under 25 minutes.
host_about: I'm a stay at home mum with a big passion for interior design. My husband is a professor at the University of Cambridge and we often travel around the world for his work. During every trip I love to investigate the design culture of that specific country and I try to bring a little piece of it back home with me. That's why I love hosting in the UK, I love to create beautiful and comfortable spaces for guests but at the same time I want to communicate my family culture through the different spaces in our homes.

name: Kensington Mews: 2 Bedroom Apartment, Private Roof Terrace
description:
Introducing an elegant and beautifully decorated 2 bed Mews House in a very pretty, centrally located cobbled Mews just moments from Gloucester Road tube station. This delightful property has the additional benefit of its own private, secluded roof terrace, where you may enjoy a quiet catch up with the newspapers over coffee, or a lovely space to dine and enjoy a glass of wine of an evening.
There are 2 main reception rooms, one with large dining table and both with flame effect gas fires... there is also a separate dedicated office space.
The kitchen is exceptionally well presented and has everything you could need to showcase your culinary flair!
The property benefits from being split over 2 floors with the bedrooms being on the upper floor...

Your host William occupies the lower apartment within the mews building (separate entrance) and will be on hand should you need - but you have your own entrance and are in an entirely separate dwelling.
host_about:
K2C are a short let calendar management and marketing service for properties across the UK & Europe, and also are also able to offer a comprehensive management service, to include 5* laundry and convenient check in,  for properties exclusively in London and Ibiza.
K2C provide a hassle free hosting and are committed to offering the best stay for everyone of our guests, and peace of mind for our hosts.
We are partnered with Superhog, which means all K2C guests will have undergone stringent vetting checks, with properties insured to the value of £1 million,  thus requiring no deposit.
From the moment you book to the moment you arrive at your short stay destination, we are here to help you through the process for a hassle free stay.

Chic, quiet 2 bedroom duplex apartment in Chelsea with terrace - eat-in kitchen - smart and spanking clean, in prestigious Chelsea on River Thames.

The Chelsea Ram Pub, Kings Road, Chelsea Design Centre and Imperial Wharf Station (one stop to West Brompton underground station) are 2 mins walk. The legendary 606 Jazz Club is around the corner. The apartment is perfect for travelling professionals, couples and sophisticated tourists needing a base in a smart part of Central London.

The space
On two floors, this quiet apartment has an eat-in kitchen, bathroom and 2 bedrooms on the first floor and a staircase leading up to the chic sitting room and west-facing terrace on the top floor. The apartment is light and has been decorated to a very high standard.

Whole apartment

neighborhood_overview: Lots Village is the last neighbourhood in Chelsea retaining quiet, old world charm. Known for the Lots Road auction house, the Design Centre, Chelsea Wharf Hotel and the legendary 606 Jazz Club, the area has excellent restaurants nearby including the prestigious Italian restaurant La Famiglia, The Chelsea Ram pub, and the many restaurants on the Kings Road and Fulham Road.
host_about: International socialite with a background in PR. Cultivated, with refined taste and a keen eye for colour and design.   Loves New York, Spain, the American West, Japanese food, Tintin, Rioja, Country and Western and Chopin.  Always satisfied with the best, striving for success on all levels.
